      • adjustDouble

        public double adjustDouble(double d)
        Description copied from interface: MathUtils
        Adjust a double value. If the number is greater than 0.95 or lesser than 0.05 will be round. In any case the number will be cut to four decimals.
        Specified by:
        adjustDouble in interface MathUtils
        Returns:
